subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी किस शहर से है।
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which festival is celebrated with great enthusiasm in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान मैंटिवल्फ़ के दिन क्या है, जहां राजस्थान में निष्कार करते हैं।
explanation_en: The Umang Festival is celebrated with great enthusiasm in Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first king of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के पहले राजा किस्मान किस्मान
explanation_en: Chet Singh Rathore was the first king of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: चेतन रावान, राजस्थान के प्राज्ञान की संतरांग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which dynasty ruled Rajasthan before Mughals?
question_hi: मुगाल से पहले राजशानों ke samajh mein, क्यां समावर्ण कोणी
explanation_en: The Mewar Dynasty ruled Rajasthan before the Mughals.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput King is known for his valour and bravery?
explanation_en: Man Singh Tomar is known for his bravery and valour in Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king established the city of Jaipur?
explanation_en: Rao Jaisa Singh established Jaipur as a capital city of Jaipur.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajasthani king was famous for his bravery?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh Khatri was a famous Rajasthani king known for his bravery.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first king of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh Khatri was the first king of Rajasthan.
